data.title: RUBIS: Fast centrifugal deformation program for stellar and planetary models
data.name: RUBIS
data.description: Rotation code Using Barotropy conservation over Isopotential Surfaces (RUBIS)

evidence: "RUBIS ... is a centrifugal deformation program that takes as input a 1D model ... and returns its deformed version" (end users run it as a program to deform stellar/planetary models).
"On a practical level, the user interface can be found in the file `RUBIS.py`" (indicates a user-facing application script rather than just a library).

The README links to a tagged release: "`RUBIS` is currently in version `v.1.1.0`..." and provides a GitHub Releases link: "https://github.com/pierrehoudayer/RUBIS/releases/tag/v1.1.0" (indicating distribution via versioned releases).
